name: Raices
description:
A first person puzzle Game.
Can you solve multiple puzzle in each room and reach to the control room's engine before the entire world collapses?

Controls:
WASD - Move
F - Zoom in/out
Right mouse click - Interact

Team Credits:

Ibrahim Safarini - Programmer
Tawfeeq Irshaidat - Programmer
Bernardo Vidal - Sound Designer/Composer
Aseel Sabri - 2D/3D Graphic Designer
Hadeel Al-Hussein - 2D/3D Graphic Designer
Leen Jariri - 2D/3D Graphic Designer
